body_content.explanation: to cause something to stop or fail before it begins or before it is complete:
examples: The mission had to be aborted at the last minute.
If something goes wrong during the launch sequence the system will automatically abort.

body_content.explanation: to stop the development of a baby that has not been born, usually by having a medical operation:
examples: He declared that women have a right to abort a nonviable fetus.
The decision to abort may be based on many factors.

body_content.explanation: to have a miscarriage (= an early, unintentional end to a pregnancy):
examples: The bacterial infection can cause animals to abort.
